com.martinleopold.mode.debug
Class LineID

java.lang.Object
  com.martinleopold.mode.debug.LineID
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.DocumentListener
public class LineID
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.DocumentListener

Describes an ID for a code line. Comprised of a file name and a (1-based) line number. Allows tracking the line when editing by attaching to a Document.

TODO: split the tracking and highlighting features into a subclass "LineBreakpoint"

Author:
Martin Leopold

toString in class java.lang.Object

enableTracking

public void enableTracking(javax.swing.text.Document doc)
Attach a Document to enable line number tracking when editing. The position to track is before the first non-whitespace character on the line. Edits happening before that position will cause the line number to update accordingly.

Parameters:
doc - the Document to use for line number tracking

public void disableTracking()
